mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_ent (cust_no, cust_typ, ent_nam, create_date, create_time, create_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_ent set cust_typ = #{custTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_nam = #{entNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_short = #{entShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_en_nam = #{entEnNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_en_short = #{entEnShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_reg_cert_no = #{bizRegCertNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_reg_cert_no = #{taxRegCertNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deposit_bank = #{depositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bln_trade = #{blnTrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_typ = #{entTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rgs_auth = #{rgsAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rgs_date = #{rgsDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_scale = #{entScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regs_capital = #{regsCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offi_website = #{offiWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_logo_url = #{entLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ent_logo_sml_blob = #{entLogoSmlBlob,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, ent_logo_big_blob = #{entLogoBigBlob,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, biz_way = #{bizWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blacklist_flg = #{blacklistFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_cust_flg = #{keyCustFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visible_range = #{visibleRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_source = #{custSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_agent = #{custAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_follow_up_tm = #{nextFollowUpTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, cust_typ, ent_nam, ent_short, ent_en_nam, ent_en_short, biz_reg_cert_no, tax_reg_cert_no, deposit_bank, bln_trade, ent_typ, rgs_auth, rgs_date, ent_scale, regs_capital, region, offi_website, remarks, ent_logo_url, ent_logo_sml_blob,ent_logo_big_blob, biz_way, blacklist_flg, key_cust_flg, visible_range, cust_source, cust_agent, next_follow_up_tm, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_ent where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
